title: Privacy Policy
preContext: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter: 'Policy') provides information about the processing of user data in connection with the use of the Formula 10 (hereinafter: 'Website'). The operator and data controller of the Website is David Felegyhazi (hereinafter: 'Operator').

listElements.title: Purpose and Types of Data Collection
listElements.context: When using the Website, we collect the following data: full name, username, email address, and password. This data is used to create and manage user accounts, as well as to provide access to the game. Additionally, email addresses are used to send notifications about game results and updates to the Website. Passwords are always stored in encrypted form to ensure their security.

listElements.title: Data Storage and Access
listElements.context: The data is stored in a remote database that operates in a secure environment. Only the Operator has access to the data, and we do not share it with third parties unless required by law. The data is stored for the duration of the user account, but users can request the deletion of their account and associated data at any time. Requests for deletion will be processed as soon as possible, but no later than within 30 days.

listElements.title: User Rights and Data Protection
listElements.context: Users have several rights regarding their data, including the right to access, correct, or delete their data, as well as the right to withdraw consent. If you have any questions about data processing or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at the following email address: felegyhazi.david@gmail.com. The Website does not use cookies, so you do not need to worry about this aspect.

listElements.title: Policy Updates
listElements.context: The Operator reserves the right to modify this Policy at any time. Users will be notified of changes via email, and the updated Policy will take effect immediately. Continued use of the Website constitutes acceptance of the updated Policy. If you have any questions about our data protection practices, please do not hesitate to contact us.
